Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame

Class StudentsBufferCardsCluster

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame.ExpertCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame.StudentsBufferCardsCluster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class StudentsBufferCardsCluster extends ExpertCard implements Serializable
This class implements the expert card system by clustering three cards
Author:
Dario d'Abate

  • Method Details

    • setStudentColorToBeMoved

      public void setStudentColorToBeMoved(Color studentColorToBeMoved)
      This method is used to set the color of a student that has to be moved from a card. If is required to move multiple student, this method will be invoked as many times as the number of student. The control over the existence of that student on the card is done by the controller
      Overrides:
      setStudentColorToBeMoved in class ExpertCard
      Parameters:
      studentColorToBeMoved - color of the student to be moved from a card

    • getStudentColorToBeMoved

      Returns:
      color of the student that will be moved

    • setStudentColorInEntrance

      public void setStudentColorInEntrance(Color studentColorInEntrance)
      This method is used to set the color of a student that has to be moved from the board's entrance of the current player. If is required to move multiple student, this method will be invoked as many times as the number of student. The control over the existence of that student in the entrance is done by the controller
      Overrides:
      setStudentColorInEntrance in class ExpertCard
      Parameters:
      studentColorInEntrance - color of the student to be moved from a card

    • getStudentColorInEntrance

      public Color getStudentColorInEntrance()
      This method gets the color of the student that will be moved from the board's entrance of the current player with the next call of effect()
      Returns:
      color of the student that will be moved from entrance

    • effect

      public void effect()
      This method simulate the effect of a card. Having gathered 3 cards in a cluster there are 3 effects.
      - Man's card: removes a student of the specified color on the card and moves it on a specified island tile, then refills the card with a single student.
      - Clown's card : swap a student of the specified color on the card with one in the board's hall of the current player
      - Woman's card: removes a student of the specified color on the card and moves it in the board's hall of the current player, then refills the card with a single student. If the hall is full, all is unchanged
      Overrides:
      effect in class ExpertCard
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when there is no student of the specified color to move from the card
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - when is chosen an index which does not have a corresponding island tile in the archipelago arrayList, used by the woman card

    • getStudBuffer

      public StudentsHandler getStudBuffer()
      Method used only for testing
      Returns:
      the reference to the studentsHandler contained in the class

      public int getIndex()
